snippet: Harlem is clearly having a big moment, as reflected in activity at the Studio Museum, a book fair and other arts events this weekend.
lead_paragraph: Harlem is clearly having a big moment, as reflected in activity at the Studio Museum, a book fair and other arts events this weekend.

headline.print_headline: At Studio Museum in Harlem, a Social and Arty Evening
headline.main: At Studio Museum in Harlem, a Social and Arty Evening
